content: I think I'll start by taking some online courses to get a solid foundation in data science and analytics. I've heard that Python is a popular language used in data science, so I'll start with that. Do you know of any good resources for learning Python, especially for someone with a background in math? By the way, my grandma, who's 75, is really proud of me for taking the initiative to learn something new, and I'm glad I can show her that age is just a number.
